title: Scan of the original printout
content:
This is a scan of my transcript. This font looks so familiar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Dec_29_002.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Dec\_29\_002a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Dec_29_002a.jpg) | 66.58 KB |
author: donixa

comments.content:
Classic ‘Letter Gothic’ is slightly similar, but narrower..  
_( ‘ [Cash](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231042806/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1129&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=EFT0000076)’ may be an alternate, as well.. )_

Dav

You’ll notice the monospacing instead of proportional spacing.  
This probably came off a line printer (which does NOT print proportionally). However….I don’t know if line printers give names to their typefaces.
